plot: The children of the night have found a pure soul, which is their Key to Heaven. The only hope the world has is the Battle Nun, who must fight through waves of vampires to save the child, and prevent an attack on the Gates of Heaven.
title: Battle Nun: Key to Heaven
plot_es: The children of the night have found a pure soul, which is their Key to Heaven. The only hope the world has is the Battle Nun, who must fight through waves of vampires to save the child, and prevent an attack on the Gates of Heaven.
plot_en: The children of the night have found a pure soul, which is their Key to Heaven. The only hope the world has is the Battle Nun, who must fight through waves of vampires to save the child, and prevent an attack on the Gates of Heaven.
